name: Nupperibo
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.Cloud of Vermin: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must make a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Constitution saving throw. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
traits.Hunger-Driven: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.
